description: Yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. As the founder of Offcourse and creator of Superconnectors, he combines entrepreneurship, thinking, and coding. Based in Taipei, he focuses on building inclusive internet ecosystems and bringing people together around common values. His work explores the evolution of 'ecosystem' concepts, internet fragmentation, global connectivity challenges, and innovative approaches to designing decentralized organizations. Yeehaa's courses cover topics like nurturing ecosystems, preserving internet diversity, and practicing innovation through strategic thinking and unconventional tools.
blurb: Ecosystem architect, PhD philosopher, and entrepreneur yeehaa combines education transformation, coding, and innovative thinking to build inclusive internet ecosystems and foster global connectivity through decentralized organizations and strategic innovation practices.
